title: Can I buy from someone who bribes in order to import from another country (banned items)? assim al
transcript: muhammad says i know a person who imports products from another country some of them are banned to import by a government i know he gives bribery to clear them from the airport i buy products from him and sell it to people is this permissible to do if what you're doing is against the law so if the ministry of trade and commerce caught you red-handed and will fine you or would uh accuse you of breaking the law this is not permissible but after being cleared from the airport if you sell it and it's legal is nothing wrong on you the the wrong in the haram is the person who got it clear through bribery you
